creator: Mojo Mobiles Games
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever thought:” Why my child doesn’t want to study or learn something new?”. The answer is quite evident because you make it a necessity. Ask yourself, do you like doing something when you have no choice? No, It’s torture for you. So how to attract a child’s attention? What is the best way to make your children learn something new? You need to make them want to study and learn new things, and after a short brainstorm, you will understand that the answer is a game. Why? Because the game is fun, interactive and they want to play it. They don’t even know that they are learning. That’s the trick! They just enjoy the game and don’t see educational moments of it. The best type of these games is a puzzle. Remembering and using in-game rules implies developing different fundamental skills, and that’s exactly what you need. Baby Panda's Rocky Supermarket is precisely this type of game.

This free app is designed for preschool children 3-8 years old. Tasks will be understandable even for kindergarten age 3-5 and interesting for 6-8 years old. Every level is built so the child will study something new: color, shape, name of the fruits and vegetables, numbers. Mini-games are very different from each other: educational puzzles, basic math, matching, focused on using a fine motor, even logic involved. We remember that it’s all for children, so we made everything full of color, fun, cute and creative. So our little ones won’t feel like they are doing boring exercises because this is exactly what we are trying to avoid. At the end of each level, there will be a reward for your kid with different stickers with animals, insects, vehicles, etc. These can be assembled in various collections.

While the child is playing the game, baby panda Rocky will help him and give an excellent example of behavior. Rocky is very polite, patient, and kind. That’s what all parents want to see in their little preschoolers. Also, he communicates with kids in simple words so a boy or a girl could understand him easily. Rocky will show your child how to help you in the supermarket, how to differentiate fruits from vegetables, and pay for products. So simple but so entertaining!

With Rocky, your kid will learn:
· Numbers
· Basic math
· Practice memory
· Differentiate fruits from vegetables
· Shapes
· Colors
· Train memory, logic, and attention
· How to purchase and pay for products

Baby Panda's Rocky Supermarket app for phones and tablets will make studying fun for your children. They will solve puzzles, count, learn new words, and understand how shopping is working. Also, Rocky is an excellent example of children. They can even pick a few traits from him and start helping a family with groceries. And all this while playing a simple game, who would have thought. You will be happy with the result, and it will be noticeable. Children are entertained by gaining knowledge, and parents are delighted that their kids are learning something new. Install our app and see it for yourself.

About Mojo Mobiles Games:
It is our passion to make amazing and educational games for kids. We combine creative and educational approaches to deliver the best for children and their parents.
We are happy to help parents to entertain and educate their kids by using modern approaches where gamification and teaching go together. We even go further and make beta tests in kindergartens with the exact target audience to deliver the best fitting games.

📧 We are open to any suggestions and comments as we permanently improve our games.
Contact us at any time: studio@mojomobiles.games

title: Kids Game with Red Panda Rocky

creator: Mojo Mobiles Games
descriptionHtml:
Let’s help Rocky and Mommy Red Pandas in this supermarket game for kids.
Rocky Red Panda's Supermarket is a fantastic educational shopping game for kids that allows your kids to develop multiple skills, including fine motor, counting, matching, creativity, geometrical figures, colors, names of fruits and vegetables, attention, and many more.

All the mini-games available in this supermarket game are designed for 3-8 years old kids, and the super easy-to-learn gameplay makes sure your kids never get bored or tired while trying to solve the educational puzzles.

So, if you are looking for an educational shopping game for kids to help them develop essential skills, you’ve come to the right place. Download Rocky Red Panda's Supermarket on your Android device and let Rocky and Mommy Red Pandas lead the way.

Educational games for preschoolers with endless challenges
Rocky Red Panda's Supermarket, the educational shopping game for kids, delivers everything you should expect from such educational games and it even sets the bar higher by offering a set of unique mini-games with amazing quality and easy to learn gameplay.

All the educational content is made entertaining for kids and helps them improve multiple basic skills. Your children get to learn how to help parents to make purchases in the supermarket. There is also a cashier, the funniest and kind Moose, waiting for you after all purchases. Learn how to pay for purchased products and get unique stickers as an award.

Why don’t you give this supermarket game a try?
No matter you are looking for an educational game for your kids to help them develop basic skills, or you are looking for a fun supermarket game to help your kids learn how to make purchases in the supermarket, we’ve got you covered.

Since the entire features of this educational shopping game for kids are available for free, there is no harm in giving it a try and explore the features for yourself.

Rocky Red Panda's Supermarket main features at a glance:
● Clean and neat design with a fresh and intuitive interface
● High-quality graphics with smooth animations
● Educational shopping game for kids
● Huge set of stickers as awards
● Learn how to pay for purchased products in a supermarket
● Free to play

Download Rocky Red Panda's Supermarket on your Android phone or tablet, and let your preschool kids have fun solving different educational puzzles while improving their basic skills such as logic, fine motor, creativity, and matching.

About Mojo Mobiles Games:
It is our passion to make amazing and educational games for kids. We combine creative and educational approaches to deliver the best for children and their parents.

We are happy to help parents to entertain and educate their kids by using modern approaches where gamification and teaching go together. We even go further and make beta tests in kindergartens with the exact target audience to deliver the best fitting games.
